gradebook.BulkManagementHistoryView.head: Bulk Management History
gradebook.BulkManagementHistoryView: Below is a log of previous grade imports.  To download a CSV of your gradebook and import grades for override, return to the Gradebook.  Please note, after importing grades, it may take a few seconds to process the override.
gradebook.BulkManagementHistoryView.succ: CSV processing. File uploads may take several minutes to complete.
gradebook.GradebookHeader.frozenWarning: The grades for this course are now frozen. Editing of grades is no longer allowed.
gradebook.GradebookHeader.unauthorizedWa: Vous n'êtes pas autorisé à voir le livret de notes pour ce cours
gradebook.GradesView.EditModal.title: Editez les notes
gradebook.GradesView.EditModal.contactSu: Showing most recent actions (max 5). To see more, please contact support
gradebook.GradesView.EditModal.saveVisib: Note: Once you save, your changes will be visible to students.
gradebook.GradesView.table.totalGradePer: La note totale est toujours affiché en pourcentage

gradebook.GradesView.InterventionsReport: Need to find students who may be falling behind?  Download the interventions report to obtain engagement metrics such as section attempts and visits.
